results.name: a(n) = number of 3-times (but not 4-times) reformable permutation of {1,...,n}.
reference: A. M. Bersani, "Reformed permutations in Mousetrap and its generalizations", preprint MeMoMat n. 15/2005.
R. K. Guy and R. J. Nowakowski, ``Mousetrap,'' in D. Miklos, V.T. Sos and T. Szonyi, eds., Combinatorics, Paul Erdős is Eighty. Bolyai Society Math. Studies, Vol. 1, pp. 193-206, 1993.
link: A. M. Bersani, On the game Mousetrap.
R. K. Guy and R. J. Nowakowski, Mousetrap Amer. Math. Monthly, 101 (1994), 1007-1010.
results.author: Kok Seng Chua (chuaks(AT)ihpc.nus.edu.sg), Mar 06 2002
